alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:02AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Autauga, southwestern Chilton, Marengo, Perry and Dallas Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Parnell to Putnam. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Marion, Linden, Uniontown, Selmont-West Selmont, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Orrville, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Bogue Chitto, Vaiden, Nanafalia, Parnell, Consul, Dannelly Reservoir, Mulberry and Paul M Grist State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central, south central, southwestern and west central Alabama.
